    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddHaltDialog

        CcddHaltDialog(java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String operation,
              int numDivisionPerStep,
              int numSteps,
              java.awt.Component parent)
        Process cancellation dialog class constructor
        Parameters:
        title - dialog title
        label - main dialog label, describing the current operation
        operation - dialog label describing the termination operation
        numDivisionPerStep - number of divisions per each major step in the operation
        numSteps - total number of steps in the operation
        parent - component over which to center the dialog

      • CcddHaltDialog

        CcddHaltDialog(boolean showProgressBar)
        Process cancellation dialog class constructor. Sets up a non-modal dialog
        Parameters:
        showProgressBar - true to display a progress bar in the dialog

      • CcddHaltDialog

        CcddHaltDialog(java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String operation,
              boolean modal,
              java.awt.Component parent)
        Process cancellation dialog class constructor. No progress bar is displayed
        Parameters:
        title - dialog title
        label - main dialog label, describing the current operation
        operation - dialog label describing the termination operation
        parent - parent component over which to center the dialog

      • initialize

        protected int initialize(java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String label,
             java.lang.String operation,
             int numDivisionPerStep,
             int numSteps,
             boolean modal,
             java.awt.Component parent)
        Create the process cancellation dialog
        Parameters:
        title - dialog title
        label - main dialog label, describing the current operation
        operation - dialog label describing the termination operation
        numDivisionPerStep - number of divisions per each major step in the operation
        numSteps - total number of steps in the operation
        modal - false to allow the other application windows to still be operated while the dialog is open
        parent - parent component over which to center the dialog

      • updateProgressBar

        protected void updateProgressBar(java.lang.String progText,
                     int startValue)
        Update the progress bar
        Parameters:
        progText - text to display within the progress bar; null to not change the text
        startValue - initial value at which to begin this sequence in the process; -1 to not change the initial value
